instruction: Find a website that lists all the natural disasters currently affecting countries around the world.
output: One website that lists all the natural disasters currently affecting countries around the world is ReliefWeb. It is a leading source for reliable and timely humanitarian information on global crises and disasters since 1996. It provides timely, focused, and detailed information on major humanitarian crises, disasters, and environmental issues in the world today. The website includes reports on current disasters, maps, in-depth hazad assessment, and regularly updated content. It also provides access to international disaster response organizations and agencies. ReliefWeb is an invaluable resource for staying informed and up-to-date on global disasters and crises.  https://reliefweb.int/disasters
